pred: Repairing tires can be quite difficult, as it requires precision and attention to detail. In the video, a man is seen working on a large tractor tire, using a machine to inflate it. The process involves checking the tire for any damage, removing the old tire, and then placing the new tire on the rim. The man then uses a machine to inflate the tire, ensuring that it is properly inflated and secure. This process can be time-consuming and requires a good understanding of tire mechanics and safety precautions.
